textMap.Modul 4: Metriken für Autor:innen: h-Ind: Module 4: Author metrics: h-index, g-index, i10 & m-quotient – use meaningfully, explain clearly
textMap.Modul 5: Journalmetriken: JIF, CiteScore: Module 5: Journal metrics: JIF, CiteScore, SNIP, SJR – use correctly, communicate clearly
textMap.Modul 6: Feld- & Zeit-Normalisierung: CN: Module 6: Field & time normalization: CNCI, FWCI, MNCS, RCR and top-10% indicators
textMap.Modul 7: Collaboration & Co-Authorship:: Module 7: Collaboration & Co-authorship: indicators, fractional counting and co-authorship networks
textMap.Modul 8: Alternative Metriken & Aufmerks: Module 8: Alternative metrics & attention: altmetrics, usage, policy mentions – use appropriately
textMap.Modul 9: Datenqualität & Disambiguierung: Module 9: Data quality & disambiguation: authors, organizations, affiliations, duplicates – plus reproducible workflows
textMap.Modul 11: Science Mapping & Wissensstruk: Module 11: Science mapping & knowledge structures: co-citation, bibliographic coupling, co-word (incl. VOSviewer/bibliometrix)
textMap.Modul 12: Forschungsbewertung in der Pra: Module 12: Research evaluation in practice: reporting patterns, dashboards, use cases (unit/faculty/person) + do/don't catalog
